Clause 1: Scope
These Data Processing Terms govern the handling of customer data on the IntelGraph platform.

Clause 2: Data Usage
We use customer data solely to provide contracted services and to improve threat intelligence relevancy.

Clause 3: Cross-Border Transfers
We may transfer personal data to processors in the United States subject to Standard Contractual Clauses and supplementary safeguards that maintain adequate protection levels.

Clause 4: Data Retention
We retain personal data for 30 days unless a longer period is required to comply with legal obligations or resolve customer requests.

Clause 5: Incident Reporting
We notify the customer of any personal data incident without undue delay and no later than seventy-two (72) hours after confirmation.
